## Statistics.createTimer() method

Adds a timer, based on the name specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createTimer(name: string, keepSamples?: boolean): Timer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The timer's name; must be unique. |
|  keepSamples | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Timer](./harp-mapview.timer.md)
